Performances > September 1975: The Vow of Rokusuke

– Click image to view.

September 1975: The Vow of Rokusuke

Plays:

The Vow of Rokusuke (彦山権現誓助剣)

Scenes:

Sumiyoshi Beach (住吉浜辺)

In Front of the Hikosan Gongen Shrine (彦山権現社前)

Otonari's Mansion (郡音成館)

The Yamaguchi Hachiman Shrine (山口八幡)

Ichimisai's Mansion (一味斎屋敷)

Suma Beach (須磨の浦)

The Gourd Trellis (瓢箪棚)

The Sugisaka Cemetery (杉坂墓所)

Rokusuke's House (毛谷村六助住家)

The Revenge at the Tatsunami Mansion (立浪館仇討)

Characters:

Yasaburo (衣川弥三郎)

Okiku (腰元お菊)

Mayumi (奥方真弓の方)

Rindayu, a Shinto priest (祝部山上倫太夫)

Mokusokan, in fact Shihoden (車騎将軍木曾官実は四方田但馬守)

Rokusuke (毛谷村六助)

Enami, a warrior (榎並一学)

Hayakawa, a warrior (早川兎毛)

Dengoemon (轟伝五右衛門)

Ichimisai (吉岡一味斎)

Yasamatsu (一子弥三松)

Tomohei (若党友平)

Yasazaemon (衣川弥三左衛門)

Takumi (京極内匠)

Tozo (春風藤蔵)

Otonari (郡大守音成)

Hisayoshi (真柴久吉)

Shingo Sakurai (桜井新吾)

Sasen (医者柴左仙)

Kotomi, a lady-in-waiting (腰元小富)

Omatsu, a lady-in-waiting (腰元お松)

Sannojo (弟三之丞)

Oko (母お幸)

Osono (娘お園)

Sagohei (若党佐吾平)

Page (小姓)

Low class samurai (青侍)

Kojika, a street girl (惣嫁小鹿(辻君お鹿))

Onoemon's mother (斧右衛門の母)

Gihei Kadowaki, a highway robber (門脇儀平)

Osen, a street girl (惣嫁(辻君)お仙)

Kikuno, a street girl (惣嫁(辻君)菊野)

Itachigawa, a sumo werestler (いたち川)

Pack-horse leader (馬丁)

Matsubei, a woodcutter (杣松兵衛)

Makizo, a woodcutter (杣槙蔵)

Kashiroku, a woodcutter (杣樫六)

Highway robber (山賊)

Soheiji, a retainer of Takumi (堀口曾平次)

Onoemon (杣斧右衛門)

Gunpachi, a retainer of Takumi (大坪軍八)

Ladies-in-waiting (腰元)

Kuriemon (杣栗右衛門)

Samurai (近習)

Assistant priests (下官)

Carpenters (大工)

Servants (組子)
